event_data.continuation_prompt:
Mission: StageOrchestrator API Compatibility - Final Validation
=========================================================

BACKGROUND:
Cycle 1 successfully implemented 100% backward API compatibility between StageOrchestrator and the legacy RDMissionController. All 66 tests pass.

OBJECTIVE:
Perform final production-readiness validation and archive the mission.

TASKS:

1. FINAL VALIDATION
   - Clear Python cache to ensure fresh bytecode
   - Run the full test suite at /home/vader/AI-AtlasForge/missions/mission_829fd261/workspace/tests/test_api_compatibility.py
   - Verify USE_MODULAR_ENGINE flag is enabled in af_engine/__init__.py

2. LIVE SYSTEM TEST
   - Import atlasforge_conductor and verify it can create an RDMissionController without errors
   - Test the three patterns that originally triggered this mission:
     a) controller.mission = controller.load_mission()
     b) controller.mission_dir
     c) controller.load_mission()

3. DOCUMENTATION
   - Update test_results.md with final cycle results
   - Generate final mission summary

SUCCESS CRITERIA:
- All tests continue to pass
- Live conductor import works without AttributeError
- No property setter errors

FILES:
- /home/vader/AI-AtlasForge/af_engine/orchestrator.py - Main implementation
- /home/vader/AI-AtlasForge/af_engine/state_manager.py - State management
- /home/vader/AI-AtlasForge/atlasforge_conductor.py - Consumer to test against

EXPECTED OUTCOME: Mission COMPLETE with full API compatibility verified.

cycle_report.summary: Cycle 1 achieved 100% backward API compatibility between StageOrchestrator and the legacy RDMissionController. All 16 core API methods/properties are now implemented in orchestrator.py (lines 100-629) and state_manager.py (lines 307-314). Comprehensive testing validated 66 test cases covering API compatibility, adversarial edge cases, integration patterns, and live mission functionality.
achievements: All 16 core API methods verified working
All 14 adversarial edge cases handled correctly
All 3 integration tests pass (conductor simulation, stage transitions, persistence)
Red team analysis confirmed no false negatives
Total: 66/66 tests pass with 100% epistemic score
issues: No remaining issues - all API compatibility gaps have been resolved
